## lcd.clear([color])



Clear the LCD screen

@status current Introduced in 2.0.0, `color` parameter introduced in 2.2.0 RC12


#### Parameters

* `color` (optional, only on color screens)



#### Return value

none

##### Notice
This function only works in stand-alone and telemetry scripts.
